info.title: MCPMate Management API
info.description: API for managing MCP servers and instances

post.description: Extract MCP server configuration from text using AI

get.description: List all MCP servers with optional filtering
Get details for a specific MCP server

post.description: Create a new MCP server

requestBody.description: Request parameters for creating a MCP server

post.description: Update server configuration

requestBody.description: Request parameters for updating MCP server

post.description: Import servers from JSON configuration
Preview capabilities for server configs without importing
Manage server (enable/disable with sync options)

get.description: List all tools for a specific server
List all resources for a specific server
List all resource templates for a specific server
List all prompts for a specific server
List instances for servers

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Server ID (optional, lists all if not provided)

schema.description: Server ID (optional, lists all if not provided)

get.description: Get details for a specific server instance
Check health status of a specific server instance

post.description: Manage instance operations (disconnect, reconnect, recover, cancel)

get.description: Get system status including uptime and server counts
Get detailed system metrics including CPU, memory, and instance counts
Get cache details. Query params: view (stats|keys), server_id (optional), limit (optional, max 1000)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (max 1000)

schema.description: Maximum number of items to return (max 1000)

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: Optional server ID to filter by

schema.description: Optional server ID to filter by

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort field - size, age, or key (reserved)

schema.description: Sort field - size, age, or key (reserved)

post.description: Reset and clear all cache data
Notify client that the tools list has changed

get.description: List all profile with optional filtering

parameters.name: filter_type
parameters.description: Filter by profile status: active, inactive, all

schema.description: Filter by profile status: active, inactive, all

parameters.name: profile_type
parameters.description: Filter by profile type: host_app, scenario, shared

schema.description: Filter by profile type: host_app, scenario, shared

post.description: Create a new profile

get.description: Get details for a specific profile

post.description: Update an existing profile
Manage profile operations (activate/deactivate)

get.description: List servers in a profile

post.description: Manage server operations (enable/disable servers in profile)

requestBody.description: Request for component management operations (unified single and batch operations)

get.description: List tools in a profile

post.description: Manage component operations (enable/disable tools, resources, prompts)

requestBody.description: Request for component management operations (unified single and batch operations)

get.description: List resources in a profile

200.description: Response for profile resources list operation

post.description: Manage component operations (enable/disable tools, resources, prompts)

requestBody.description: Request for component management operations (unified single and batch operations)

get.description: List prompts in a profile

200.description: Response for profile prompts list operation

post.description: Manage component operations (enable/disable tools, resources, prompts)

requestBody.description: Request for component management operations (unified single and batch operations)

post.description: Install runtime package (UV or Bun) with optional configuration

get.description: Get runtime status for UV and Bun
Get runtime cache information and statistics

post.description: Reset runtime cache. Payload: {cache_type: 'all'|'uv'|'bun'} (default: 'all')

get.description: Get all client with optional force refresh.

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Whether to refresh the client list

schema.description: Whether to refresh the client list

get.description: Get client configuration details

post.description: Apply client configuration with specified settings
Restore a client configuration from backup
Preview or import servers from client's existing configuration
Enable or disable MCPMate management for a client

get.description: List stored configuration backups

post.description: Delete a configuration backup

get.description: Get backup retention policy for a client

post.description: Set backup retention policy for a client

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

text_base64.description: Base64 encoded text content to extract MCP configuration from

generated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when data was generated

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (max 1000)

server_id.description: Optional server ID to filter by

sort_by.description: Sort field - size, age, or key (reserved)

approxValueSizeBytes.description: Approximate size of cached value in bytes

cached_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this item was cached

serverId.description: ID of the server this key belongs to

success.description: Whether the reset operation was successful

db_path.description: Path to the cache database file

tables.description: Count of items in each table

CacheTablesCount.description: Count of items in each cache table

oneOf.description: Show storage statistics and performance metrics

ClientBackupEntry.description: Single backup entry for a client configuration

limit.description: Optional limit for keep_n policy (system default: 30)

ClientBackupPolicyPayload.description: Backup policy descriptor for API payload

limit.description: Optional limit for keep_n policy (recommended: 30; new clients default to 30)

ClientCategory.description: Client application category - application or extension

oneOf.description: Extension or plugin requiring host application

client.description: Array of clientlications with their detection status

refresh.description: Whether to refresh the client list

supported_runtimes.description: Supported runtimes for current platform or fallback

supported_transports.description: Supported transports derived from the template

template.description: Template metadata summary for this client

ClientConfigImportData.description: Import result for client configuration import

profile_id.description: Profile id used for association (when applied)

scheduled.description: Whether capability sync was scheduled in background

preview.description: Preview only without applying changes (default: true)

profile_id.description: Target profile id; default profile if omitted

ClientConfigSelected.description: Selected configuration source - profile, servers, or default

oneOf.description: Use specific servers by their IDs

backup_path.description: Path to backup file if created

diff_after.description: Content after applying (if available in preview)

diff_before.description: Original content before applying (if available in preview)

scheduled.description: Whether the write was scheduled due to a temporary lock

mode.description: Configuration mode - hosted or transparent (default: hosted)

preview.description: Whether to only preview changes without applying them (default: true)

ClientImportSummary.description: Summary for servers imported from a client config

attempted.description: Whether import was attempted for this request

errors.description: Optional per-server error messages for failures

failed_count.description: Number of servers failed to import

detected.description: Whether client is installed and detected

enabled.description: Whether client is enabled in MCPMate

last_modified.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last config modification

template.description: Template metadata summary for this client

ClientTemplateMetadata.description: Summary of the client template metadata

container_type.description: Container type resolved from the template

keep_original_config.description: Whether original configuration segments are preserved

merge_strategy.description: Merge strategy applied when writing configuration

protocol_revision.description: Declared MCP protocol revision for the template

ClientTemplateStorageMetadata.description: Storage metadata for a client template

in_progress.description: Whether a configuration application is currently in progress

started_at.description: Start time of the current application (ISO 8601 format)

total_servers.description: Total number of servers being processed

cpu_usage.description: CPU usage percentage of the instance process

error_message.description: Error message if status is Error

memory_usage.description: Memory usage in bytes of the instance process

connection_stability.description: Stability score based on connection history (0.0-1.0)

resource_metrics.description: Resource usage metrics for the instance

id.description: Server ID (optional, lists all if not provided)

ProfileComponentListReq.description: Request for profile component list (servers, tools, etc.)

ProfileComponentManageReq.description: Request for component management operations (unified single and batch operations)

action.description: Management action to perform on component(s)

component_ids.description: Component identifiers (single element for individual operations, multiple for batch)

is_active.description: Whether the profile is currently active

is_default.description: Whether the profile is the default one

multi_select.description: Whether multiple profile can be selected simultaneously

priority.description: Priority of the profile (higher priority wins in case of conflicts)

profile_type.description: Type of the profile (host_app, scenario, shared)

is_active.description: Whether the profile is currently active

is_default.description: Whether the profile is the default one

multi_select.description: Whether multiple profile can be selected simultaneously

priority.description: Priority of the profile (higher priority wins in case of conflicts)

profile_type.description: Type of the profile (host_app, scenario, shared)

prompts_count.description: Number of enabled prompts in profile

resources_count.description: Number of enabled resources in profile

servers_count.description: Number of enabled servers in profile

tools_count.description: Number of enabled tools in profile

total.description: Total number of profile matching filter

filter_type.description: Filter by profile status: active, inactive, all

profile_type.description: Filter by profile type: host_app, scenario, shared

sync.description: Whether to trigger client configuration synchronization

enabled.description: Whether the prompt is enabled in this profile

prompt_name.description: Prompt name (original name from upstream server)

ProfilePromptsListData.description: Data for profile prompts list operation

prompts.description: List of prompts in this profile

total.description: Total number of prompts in profile

ProfilePromptsListResp.description: Response for profile prompts list operation

enabled.description: Whether the resource is enabled in this profile

resource_uri.description: Resource URI (original URI from upstream server)

ProfileResourcesListData.description: Data for profile resources list operation

resources.description: List of resources in this profile

total.description: Total number of resources in profile

ProfileResourcesListResp.description: Response for profile resources list operation

results.description: Operation results (single element for individual operations, multiple for batch)

enabled.description: Whether the server is enabled in this profile

ProfileServersListData.description: Response for profile servers list operation

servers.description: List of servers in this profile

total.description: Total number of servers in profile

enabled.description: Whether the tool is enabled in this profile

tool_name.description: Tool name (original name from upstream server)

unique_name.description: Unique name for external display and routing

ProfileToolsListData.description: Response for profile tools list operation

tools.description: List of tools in this profile

total.description: Total number of tools in profile

is_active.description: Whether the profile is currently active

is_default.description: Whether the profile is the default one

multi_select.description: Whether multiple profile can be selected simultaneously

priority.description: Priority of the profile (higher priority wins in case of conflicts)

profile_type.description: Type of the profile (host_app, scenario, shared)

cache_type.description: Cache type to reset: all, uv, or bun (default: all)

runtime_type.description: Runtime type to install (uv or bun)

ServerCreateReq.description: Request parameters for creating a MCP server

args.description: List of arguments passed to the command (optional for stdio type)

command.description: Server startup command (required for stdio type)

enabled.description: Whether to enable this server in the default profile

env.description: Environment variables to set (optional for stdio type)

server_type.description: Server type, must be stdio, sse, or streamable_http

url.description: Server URL (required for sse and streamable_http types)

args.description: Arguments to pass to the command (for stdio servers)

enabled.description: Is enabled in configuration (combined global and profile status)

enabled_in_profile.description: Is enabled in any active profile (profile_server.enabled)

env.description: Environment variables to set (for stdio servers)

updated_at.description: When the configuration was last updated

ServerInstanceReq.description: Request with server and instance IDs

ServerPreviewItemData.description: Preview item response with capabilities snapshot

oneOf.description: Auto refresh based on cache policy

ServerResourceMetrics.description: Server resource metrics for an instance

cpu_usage.description: CPU usage percentage of the instance process

memory_usage.description: Memory usage in bytes of the instance process

ServerUpdateReq.description: Request parameters for updating MCP server

args.description: List of arguments passed to the command

id.description: ID of the server to update

kind.description: Server type, if provided must be stdio, sse, or streamable_http

type.description: Type of the server (stdio, sse, streamable_http)

args.description: Arguments to pass to the command (for stdio servers)

env.description: Environment variables to set (for stdio servers)

error_details.description: Detailed error information for failed servers

failed_servers.description: List of servers that failed to import

mcpServers.description: Map of MCP server name to configuration

cpu_usage.description: CPU usage percentage of the proxy process

memory_usage.description: Memory usage in bytes of the proxy process

system_memory_usage.description: Overall system memory usage in bytes

status.description: System status - running, starting, stopping, etc.

ToolChangeScope.description: Scope of the tool change (default: all)

service_id.description: Optional service ID (if not provided, will apply to all services with this tool)

ToolsChangedDetails.description: Details about the tools changed operation

service_ids.description: Service IDs to apply the change to (required when scope is Services)

tools.description: Tool identifiers to apply the change to (required when scope is Tools)
